author: Dominic-Stafford
body:
#### PR description:

Adds Herwig 7.2.2 to CMSSW_9_4_X (replacing Herwigpp) for use in the Heavy Ion run (requested by the top group). Also adds Herwig Settings blocks, and workflow 535 for testing. Follow up to #28649, which was not merged due to a build error (possibly because the old ThePEGInterface was not removed)

#### PR validation:

Tested with workflow 535, and matchbox test command

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
Backports a large number of PRs on the master branch upgrading Herwig
title: Upgrade 9_4_X to Herwig 7.2
